ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $UserRole.Name = "NSS Inbound Rep - Kane", ISCHANGED(CallDisposition), CallDisposition <> "", CallDisposition <> "INB - Non-Sales Lead", CallDisposition <> "INB - Created Oppty - Unable to Reach", CallDisposition <> "INB - Created Oppty - Contacted", CallDisposition <> "INB - Created Oppty - Warm Rep Transfer", CallDisposition <> "INB - Callback", CallDisposition <> "INB - Customer Service - Employer", CallDisposition <> "INB - Customer Service - Employee", CallDisposition <> "INB - Answered/No One on Line", CallDisposition <> "INB - Previous Lead", CallDisposition <> "INB - Not Interested" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Call result must be "INB - "+ Non-Sales Lead, Created Oppty - Unable to Reach, Created Oppty - Contacted, Created Oppty - Warm Rep Transfer, Customer Service - Employer, Customer Service - Employee, Answered/No One on Line, Previous Lead, Not Interested
